conbody.p: List setting item (for example, radio button setting) works with a touch down and release. A touch down and release directly moves the mark in radio button list and closes the pop-up. In multi-selection list, first touch down and release only checks or unchecks the item. Touch down and release second time activates the item and the pop-up closes.
